title: Renewable electricity output (% of total electricity output)
name: eg.elc.rnew.zs
readme: Renewable electricity is the share of electrity generated by renewable power plants in total electricity generated by all types of plants.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Renewable electricity is the share of electrity generated by renewable power plants in total electricity generated by all types of plants.
